children.text: Access into the roof cavity through the manhole is unduly difficult.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 5601 – 2004 Gas Installations, clause 5.3.11 Appliances in Roof Spaces, requires that
‘The location of the appliance is to allow access for lighting and servicing’
‘Access can be gained without hazard or undue difficulty for inspection, repair, renewal or operational purposes’ .
The access into this roof must be rectified to allow for safe access to service the area.
